byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and BEN PROTESS

lead_paragraph: Lisa Zornberg, a partner at Lankler Siffert & Wohl and an ex-prosecutor, would replace Daniel L. Stein, who is stepping down to join Mayer Brown.

headline.print_headline: New Chief for U.S. Crime Division
headline.main: Manhattan U.S. Attorney Expected to Name Defense Lawyer to Lead Criminal Unit

snippet: Lisa Zornberg, a partner at Lankler Siffert & Wohl and an ex-prosecutor, would replace Daniel L. Stein, who is stepping down to join Mayer Brown....
abstract: Attorney Lisa Zornberg, partner at Lankler Siffert & Wohl, is expected to be appointed next criminal division head by United States attorney Preet Bharara; is slated to replace Daniel L Stein, who is resigning to join law firm Mayer Brown.
